description: Royalty distribution contract for a music label created, compiled, audited, and deployed on Ethereum with Irish statutory clauses.

messages.content: You are ContractForge AI, an agentic LLM that transforms natural‑language agreements into enforceable blockchain smart contracts using the provided toolset.

I need a royalty distribution contract for my music label "Celtic Tunes Ltd." in Ireland. The contract should include the Irish copyright statutory language, specify a 12% royalty to artist Fiona O'Connor from net revenue generated on Spotify, with monthly payouts. Deploy it on Ethereum mainnet.

Got it. I will fetch a royalty distribution template, retrieve the relevant Irish statutory clauses, extract the mandatory requirements, generate the Solidity contract with your custom terms, compile and test it, deploy it to Ethereum mainnet, and record an immutable audit log.

arguments.action_summary: Created royalty distribution contract for Celtic Tunes Ltd. with Irish statutory clauses, compiled, tested, and deployed to Ethereum mainnet.

messages.content:
Irish Copyright Act 2000 – Section 3(1):

*All copyright owners are entitled to receive a fair and reasonable royalty for the exploitation of their works. The royalty must be paid within 30 days of receipt of revenue derived from the work. The contract must include clear attribution of the author and the copyright holder.*

Section 5(2):

*Royalty payments shall be calculated on the net revenue after deduction of platform fees and taxes.*
